results.title: Synergistic Effect of Simvastatin and Romidepsin on Gamma-globin Gene Induction
results.text_hl: We hope @CHEMICAL_romidepsin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C087123 @@@ROM@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ combination therapy may lead  to promising results in @DISEASE_Relative_Energy_Deficiency_in_Sport @DISEASE_MESH:D000080822 @@@ss-thal@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with least  side effects and reduce need for blood transfusion.

citations.NLM: Habibi H, Atashi A, Abroun S, Noruzinia M. Synergistic Effect of Simvastatin and Romidepsin on Gamma-globin Gene Induction Cell J. 2019 Jan;20(4):576-583. PMID: 30124006
citations.BibTeX: @article{30124006, title={Synergistic Effect of Simvastatin and Romidepsin on Gamma-globin Gene Induction}, author={Habibi H and Atashi A and Abroun S and Noruzinia M}, journal={Cell J}, volume={20}, number={4}, pages={576-583}}

results.title: Simvastatin reduces vaso-occlusive pain in sickle cell anaemia: a pilot efficacy trial.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduces @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@vaso-occlusive pain@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@sickle cell anaemia@@@: a pilot efficacy trial.

citations.NLM: Hoppe C, Jacob E, Styles L, Kuypers F, Larkin S, Vichinsky E. Simvastatin reduces vaso-occlusive pain in sickle cell anaemia: a pilot efficacy trial. Br J Haematol. 2017 May;177(4):620-629. PMID: 28369718
citations.BibTeX: @article{28369718, title={Simvastatin reduces vaso-occlusive pain in sickle cell anaemia: a pilot efficacy trial.}, author={Hoppe C and Jacob E and Styles L and Kuypers F and Larkin S and Vichinsky E}, journal={Br J Haematol}, volume={177}, number={4}, pages={620-629}}

results.title: A pilot study of the short-term use of simvastatin in sickle cell disease: effects on markers of vascular dysfunction.
results.text_hl: We treated 26 @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@SCD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 20 or 40 mg/d, for 21 d.

citations.NLM: Hoppe C, Kuypers F, Larkin S, Hagar W, Vichinsky E, Styles L. A pilot study of the short-term use of simvastatin in sickle cell disease: effects on markers of vascular dysfunction. Br J Haematol. 2011 Jun;153(5):655-63. PMID: 21477202

results.title: Participation of Mac-1, LFA-1 and VLA-4 integrins in the in vitro adhesion of sickle cell disease neutrophils to endothelial layers, and reversal of adhesion by simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Participation of @GENE_ITGAM @GENE_3684 @@@Mac-1@@@, @GENE_ITGAL @GENE_3683 @@@LFA-1@@@ and VLA-4 integrins in the in vitro adhesion of @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Sickle_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000755 @@@sickle cell disease@@@ neutrophils to endothelial layers, and reversal of adhesion by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Canalli AA, Proença RF, Franco-Penteado CF, Traina F, Sakamoto TM, Saad ST, Conran N, Costa FF.
